entry.title: Red Hood, Green Heart
entry.summary:
Author: Persadol

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 99,444Chapters: 13/?Kudos: 131

Summary: Jason Todd has died before-and he hasn't quite come back whole. Haunted by shadows of his past and the weight of justice in Gotham, he finds comfort only in silence and the static crackle of Alfred's voice in his comms.That is, until the night a portal rips open above him and a very unexpected visitor-blue-skinned, horned, and definitely not from this world-crashes straight into his life. Literally.You're a druid from the forests of the Forgotten Realms, on a peaceful path of healing and harmony‚Ä¶ until a bandit ambush and a wild spell gone wrong land you flat on top of a masked stranger in a dark, alien city.Jason doesn't do magic. You don't do guns. But somehow, between Gotham rooftops and druidic spells, trauma and trust, gunfire and green growth-you might just change each other's worlds.

entry.title: Cracks in the Armor
entry.summary:
Author: arkham_bunniii

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,987Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 188

Summary: You were a former GCPD detective who left the force after Gotham‚Äôs corruption pushed you too far. Now, you work in the gray area of Gotham‚Äôs underworld‚Äîtracking weapons, gathering intel, and occasionally taking down the scum that even the Bat can‚Äôt reach.When the Arkham Knight arrives, he doesn‚Äôt just tear through Gotham‚Ä¶ he takes it over in a single night. Every time you cross paths, it‚Äôs the same: a dangerous game of cat and mouse.You‚Äôre enemies. You should be enemies. But every fight, every standoff, pulls you closer, and something tells you there‚Äôs more to this soldier than the armor he wears.All your begging to ask is, what‚Äôs really beneath that helmet?

Author: strangenight (strangerlets)

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,593Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 15

With John Constantine unable to help - and very reluctant - he ends up pointing to someone who should never have gotten involved. entry.title: Red in between the Lines
entry.summary:
Author: kimismiki

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,005Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 7

Summary: As you jump into the never-ending, crime-centric city of Gotham, you'll navigate through Peter's lens. He is currently a Fashion Design intern for a company called Dhillon. Does it pay rent? Yes. Does it pay for a studio where he can design? Yes. Does he absolutely like doing it? No. But he still does it, because he has an ambition of rising to the top and working with all of the amazing designers in the city. Jumping in, Peter sits in the Spot, as he likes to call it, and is sketching away, for his next deadline- that he knows will be thrown onto him, once he gets through the upcoming Fashion Week. While he is sketching and admiring the flower store from across the way, a stranger taps him on the shoulder, handing back his wallet. The stranger, tall, almost brooding, with a weird "J" scar that brands his cheek, and a streak of white hair that only comes from his cowlick. This stranger has a weird temptation on Peter, begging him to know more, but also keep a distance, since you know, they're in Gotham.
